completions.nl_description: Move all the shapes with size greater than 1 downwards to remove the ones of size 1.
Move all objects of color Y to the bottom edge of the grid.
Extend the objects of color X while keeping overlap false.
Switch the positions of objects of color Y and X.
Move X-shaped objects toward each other if they are neighbors.
Move objects of size 7 towards the nearest object.
Move all contiguous regions towards each other when neighboring and overlapping, then eliminate the overlapping objects.
completions.code:
(do
  (rule
    (vars (this other))
    (filter 
      (neighbor_of this other))
    (apply
      (move_node (direction_of other))
    ))
  (rule
    (vars (this other))
    (filter (neighbor_of this other))
    (apply
      (update_color O)
    )))

completions.nl_description: Extend all objects of color different than X toward objects of color X, without overlapping.
Move all objects of the smallest size toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it, and recolor them to match the color of the object X.
Move all X objects upwards and then remove X objects that have no neighbors.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all 'Y' colored objects towards the position with maximum 'X' colored objects
Move all objects of size 8 toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size greater than 3 one step up
Move all objects of color different than O into the top left, maintaining their relative positions.
Merge the objects but preserve the color of the larger object.
If any object is at least partially adjacent and has the same color, merge them and remove any extra cells.
Move down objects which overlap along the horizontal center with objects of color X and clear color X.
Move all the objects of yellow color next to the object of color red.
Remove isolated objects of size less than 8.
Merge connected objects of the same color together
Merge all horizontal groups of neighboring objects with their neighbors
Recolor all neighbors of objects of color X to the color of the color X object.
Move the smallest square towards the largest square until they intersect.
Move all objects of size greater than 2 towards the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects toward an object of color X, if they are neighbors of it, then recolor them with the color of the adjacent object.
Move the yellow approximate square down to replace part of the horizontal red object.
Move all objects of color different than X, if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Move all objects of size 8 or more one step to the left.
Extend objects of color Y towards objects of color X, without overlapping.
Move objects of size greater than 3 to the right, if they are neighbors of an object of size greater than 3.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Delete objects of size 1 and 2 that have the neighboring object X
Move objects of color X toward the nearest neighboring object.
Move all objects of color Y (yellow) toward the object of color X (grey), if they are neighbors of it.
Move all horizontal objects of size greater than 3 that are neighbors of each other towards each other
Extend objects of color different than O and with horizontal dimensions towards each other, without overlapping.
Remove all cyan (X) objects.
Replace the left object with the right object if they are adjacent.
Recolor all horizontal bars containing the color Y with alternating segments of colors Y and X.
Move all objects of color different than X towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Remove all objects of color Y.
Move all the objects in the middle row to the next row below them.
Extend all objects of size greater than 1 downward, without overlapping.
Extend all objects of color Y towards the X object, without overlapping.
Move the largest rectangle upwards, filling the empty cells along the way and leaving an empty row at the bottom.
Move all objects of color X up along the column, stopping upon collision with another object or reaching the grid boundary.
Move the neighbor objects of the border with color X toward the middle X objects and capture the border by X objects.
Move objects of size 12 down so they are merged with their neighboring blue objects.
Remove all Y-colored objects if they are neighbors of an X-colored object
Move all squares to the bottom row.
Replace objects having different neighboring color with that object if they are adjacent to each other.
Move the blue objects downwards, and the yellow objects upwards.
Remove objects that are isolated and recolor their neighbors to match them
Extend all objects that are neighbors of the object with color X upwards, without overlapping.
Merge all objects that share an edge.
Merge adjacent objects of different colors into one object of the color at the bottom.
Move all enclosing objects to the position of the leftmost X object.
Move all vertical lines of color X one step left
Extend objects of color different than O downwards until they form a single row.
Move the objects of color Y and G that are neighboring the object of color X towards X.
Move all horizontal line objects down to the bottom and then recolor Y who was adjacent to objects of different color.
Extend all objects towards the adjacent neighboring objects of different color, then recolor them to that neighbor's color.
Extend all objects towards the other object of color of X, without overlapping.
Move objects of size 8 one step down.
Extend all objects of colors Y and G toward the object of color X, without overlapping.
Move all objects to reduce row overlap with other objects while maintaining their alignment.
Move the objects of color X downwards if they are neighbors of the nearest non-X object.
Move all objects of color toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend selected objects of specific shape (enclosed) toward each other.
Move all objects of color Y toward the object of color X without overlapping.
Move all objects of color Y one step to the right.
Remove all objects that intersect with the object of color X.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move each object of size greater than 6 one step up.
Move all smaller objects adjacent to larger ones into the larger objects' positions.
Move objects containing Y downwards, merging them with adjacent R or G objects.
Move yellow objects toward each other without overlapping.
Extend all objects of color different than X toward the edge of the grid, until they hit another object or the edge of the grid.
Remove all objects touching the object of color X, and then remove objects of color Y that touch the object of color R.
Move all objects, except walls, toward the walls if they are neighbors.
Remove all objects of size 1 and 2 from the grid.
Move all objects of size 7 one step up
Extend the bottom Y-colored object to the right until it hits another object, then extend the bottom X-colored object to the left until it hits another object.
Extend objects of color Y and G towards neighboring objects of color X while not overlapping.
Extend all objects of size 1 toward the object of maximum size, without overlapping.
Remove all objects except the ones of color X.

Move objects in contact with X in the direction of X. If there are other blocks in the destination direction, move all the involved objects, and finally if the objects end up being grouped altogether reshape them to a rectangle.
Move yellow Y objects to the top of the grid.
Extend the objects of color X by 1 step inward to enclose the objects of the respective grid with X object inside it.
Move all objects of color Y up to align with the objects of color X.
Move all objects that do not have color X upward until they reach color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects downward and if they go off the grid, remove them.
Remove objects of color other than X if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Move all objects of color Y toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.

Move all objects of color different than X one step toward the direction of the object of color X if they are neighbors, recolor the neighbors of the object of color X to color X, then change the color of any remaining object of color Y to color O.
Move all horizontal line blocks to a closer common row.
Extend all objects while leaving a trail, until they hit another object of size other than 9 without overlapping.
Move all neighboring objects towards the object of color X until they displace adjacent ones.
Move all the objects to the same column as the object 'X'.
